BugInstance.message: org.apache.shardingsphere.infra.session.connection.ConnectionContext.getCursorContext() may expose internal representation by returning ConnectionContext.cursorContext
org.apache.shardingsphere.infra.session.connection.ConnectionContext.getTransactionContext() may expose internal representation by returning ConnectionContext.transactionContext
org.apache.shardingsphere.infra.session.connection.cursor.CursorConnectionContext.getCursorDefinitions() may expose internal representation by returning CursorConnectionContext.cursorDefinitions

org.apache.shardingsphere.infra.session.connection.cursor.CursorConnectionContext.getExecutedAllDirections() may expose internal representation by returning CursorConnectionContext.executedAllDirections
org.apache.shardingsphere.infra.session.connection.cursor.CursorConnectionContext.getMinGroupRowCounts() may expose internal representation by returning CursorConnectionContext.minGroupRowCounts
org.apache.shardingsphere.infra.session.connection.cursor.CursorConnectionContext.getOrderByValueGroups() may expose internal representation by returning CursorConnectionContext.orderByValueGroups
org.apache.shardingsphere.infra.session.query.QueryContext.getHintValueContext() may expose internal representation by returning QueryContext.hintValueContext
org.apache.shardingsphere.infra.session.query.QueryContext.getParameters() may expose internal representation by returning QueryContext.parameters

new org.apache.shardingsphere.infra.session.query.QueryContext(SQLStatementContext, String, List, HintValueContext, boolean) may expose internal representation by storing an externally mutable object into QueryContext.parameters
